name: Advanced Studio Practice
description: An advanced course for students ready to work independently on their own projects. Students will be expected to work on their projects from conception to a final exhibition in the student-run gallery. Students may work in their choice of media.
prerequisites: 1.5 credits at the C-level in VPS courses.
exclusions: VIS401H, VIS402H, VIS403H, VIS404H, FAS450Y, FAS451H, FAS452H
